tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE grid_maintenance_schedule (
    schedule_id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    asset_id UUID NOT NULL,
    maintenance_type VARCHAR(50) NOT NULL,
    maintenance_date DATE NOT NULL,
    duration_hours INT NOT NULL,
    maintenance_cost DECIMAL(10,2) NOT NULL
);
CREATE TABLE grid_maintenance_schedule (record_id INT PRIMARY KEY, equipment_id INT, maintenance_date DATE, completed BOOLEAN);
CREATE TABLE equipment (equipment_id INT PRIMARY KEY, equipment_name VARCHAR(50), location VARCHAR(50), last_maintenance_date DATE, status VARCHAR(20));
CREATE TABLE maintenance_log (log_id INT PRIMARY KEY, maintenance_date DATE, equipment_id INT, technician_name VARCHAR(50), details TEXT);

CREATE TABLE GridMaintenanceSchedule (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    grid_id UUID,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type TEXT,
    maintenance_desc TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceHistory (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    schedule_id UUID,
    maintenance_date DATE,
    maintenance_type TEXT,
    maintenance_result TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceLogs (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    maintenance_id UUID,
    log_date TIMESTAMP,
    log_description TEXT,
    log_status TEXT
)

CREATE TABLE MaintenanceCost (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    maintenance_id UUID,
    material_cost DECIMAL,
    labor_cost DECIMAL,
    total_cost DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE BlockchainMetadata (
    id UUID PRIMARY KEY,
    block_id UUID,
    timestamp TIMESTAMP,
    description TEXT
)
